import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import Header from '../../components/header'; import Footer from '../../components/footer'; import './user.css' const Profile = () => { const user = useSelector(state => state.user); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { if(!user.token) return; fetch ('http://localhost:3001/api/v1/user/profile', { method : 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/Json', 'Authorization' : `Bearer ${user.token}` }, }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { // Sauvegarder dans redux firstname / lastname / email console.log(data.body) setIsLoading(false) }) }, [user]) if(isLoading) return
